name: The Little Robot Helper In Space
name_original: The Little Robot Helper In Space
description:
Play as a little robot waking up on a space ship with a mission to save the day. This is a small 3-6 minute game where you test your problem solving skills and stress level.

This game was originally supposed to be made during Ludum Dare 46. But as I did'nt have time to finnish it during the weekend, I instead spent two weeks making this tiny game.

This is the first complete game I have made in about 10 years, but hopefully there is more to come after.
